Summary: Looking up at the darkening sky above Joshua Tree, CA.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and i saw a bright shining star like object moving in a eastward direction. over the 29 palms marine base, this was higher then any usual plane, we see these all the time when we look hard enough, i feel if i had some type of night vision anyone could view these objects.. anyway we have a good view from our house from our house, it would fade in and out, slow down then speed up as it was traveling. it was in eyesight view for approx. 4 to 5 min. it faded to the east. possibly folks in laughlin nv. or parker arizona, saw something traveling east around 6:15 or so..i realize there is a marinebase there but even for them this unusual in the area...the camera i have does not zoom in close enough. even then it would look like another white dot moving awkwardly
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Yucca Valley
There were no other sightings in Yucca Valley on or around February 26th 2009
